rows.label: bf06350100_0010
rows.name: What're you saying? That we're not Adel's bloodline?

rows.label: bf06350100_0020
rows.name:
Precisely.
In Iira, our family were just a cadet branch.

rows.label: bf06350100_0030
rows.name:
We only gained our current position in the
confusion of the war's aftermath.

rows.label: bf06350100_0040
rows.name: But then... we're just a bunch of usurpers!

rows.label: bf06350100_0060
rows.name:
We had no choice.
The nation must continue at all costs.

rows.label: bf06350100_0070
rows.name: Even if it means using Adele's name?

rows.label: bf06350100_0080
rows.name:
With its guiding force gone,
much blood was spilled in Iira.

rows.label: bf06350100_0090
rows.name: It was necessary to unite it as Luxuria.
